wordpressPage.title: A to Z Scavenger Hunt
wordpressPage.content:
This challenge is simple…you need teams of young people, pens and the scavenger hunt sheets (downloadable below). Young people have to find & collect items beginning with A to Z (or photograph if they can’t take the item away..i.e. traffic cone!) to get points.

Click here to download the A to Z scavenger hunt sheet. Thanks to Phil Simpson for the idea!
